column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Sauce: I actually prefer the flavor of the sauce at Lou's compared to Giordano's
column2: but much prefer the consistency of Giordano's(which just seems fresher with larger chunks of tomato). The sauce at Lou's is a bit sweeter while still being spiced similarly(I'm a fan)
column3: but for the most part seemed like a paste rather than a more natural and made-to-order tomato sauce.
